message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While it's true that our overall success rate with high-quality items might not be perfect, rest assured that we maintain strict quality control standards. This particular product, however, is one of our lower-quality offerings. Given its nature, its value might not align with our higher-priced items. Please consider your needs and expectations carefully before making a decision. Remember, the price is fixed at $10000, and once purchased, the product cannot be returned. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask!
